<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
POLICY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/ca-governor-newsom-unveils-plan-for-assault-weapons-ban-with-texas-s-abortion-bill-as-inspiration?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}">
<font color="#000000">
California Takes Inspo From Texas
</font>
</a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/ca-governor-newsom-unveils-plan-for-assault-weapons-ban-with-texas-s-abortion-bill-as-inspiration?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}" class="">
<img alt="SAN LEANDRO, CALIFORNIA - SEPTEMBER 08:  California Gov. Gavin Newsom sp..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/70973ab384845823f080a7cda69b42d99616ee1c-5363x3488.jpg?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a><span class="source" style="display:inline-block;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px"><small><em>Justin Sullivan/Getty Images</em></small></span>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">When Texas passed an abortion law that leaves enforcement authority in the hands of private individuals, experts predicted this unusual structure could become a model for other legislation.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">They were right.</strong> California Gov. Gavin Newsom said this weekend that he’s crafting a law that <a href="https://www.axios.com/california-law-texas-abortion-ban-assault-weapons-af5d449d-4849-45b2-9493-92ac1c2e5f97.html?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bans assault-style weapons</a> using an enforcement approach similar to that of Texas’s abortion bill. It would allow private citizens to sue anyone who manufactures, distributes, or sells those weapons for up to $10,000 (Texas’s law empowers individuals to sue abortion clinics.)</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px"><li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span><strong style="color:#000">Some context: </strong></span><span>California had previously banned assault weapons for 32 years, but that was </span><span><a href="https://apnews.com/article/government-and-politics-california-courts-us-supreme-court-health-1c09f80feb967be7c52bec1e2f1b88a4?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">overturned</a></span><span> this summer by a federal judge. Newsom ripped the judge following the ruling and began looking for alternative ways to enforce an assault weapons ban.</span>
</li></ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Enter: Texas</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Newsom, a Democrat, is no fan of Texas’s law that bans most abortions—he’s even pledged to make California an abortion “sanctuary” should Roe v. Wade get upended by the Supreme Court.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So far, Texas’s law is holding up in court despite a barrage of legal challenges, and last week the Supreme Court allowed it to remain in effect. Newsom thought, “Hey, if they can do it to advance their policy goals, so can I.”</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px"><li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Gun rights advocates saw this coming. One nonprofit even filed a brief with the Supreme Court opposing Texas’s abortion law because of the potential consequences for the second amendment.</span></li></ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture: </strong>Republicans in California say Newsom’s announcement is just “grandstanding” in order to pad his presidential resume, should he decide to run. But it’s still a sign that other states aiming to ramp up gun control may take their cue from Texas.</p>
</div>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
WEATHER
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/devastating-tornadoes-level-parts-of-the-midwest?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}">
<font color="#000000">
Deadly Tornadoes Rip Through the Midwest
</font>
</a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/devastating-tornadoes-level-parts-of-the-midwest?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}" class="">
<img alt="homes and businesses are destroyed after a tornado ripped through town the previous evening" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/6889d09570a86365dd6d7db0d06cba615b29da3f-1024x683.jpg?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a><span class="source" style="display:inline-block;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px"><small><em>Scott Olson/Getty Images</em></small></span>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A series of tornadoes <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/12/12/more-than-80-killed-in-kentucky-after-deadly-tornadoes-rip-across-several-states.html?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">flattened communities</a> in Kentucky and other Midwestern states on Friday night. Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear said more than 80 people were killed in his state, but expected the death toll to rise to over 100. It is the deadliest tornado event in the state’s history, Beshear said.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Twisters are rare for December, but atypical hot and humid weather contributed to a <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/deadly-tornadoes-that-ravaged-six-states-tied-to-weird-weather-patterns-11639339186?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">remarkably powerful</a> storm cluster.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>A single tornado traveled 250 miles, which, if initial reports are confirmed, would break the record for the longest tornado track.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Debris were hurled up to 30,000 feet in the air, or as high as commercial jets fly.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Factories where workers were busy prepping products ahead of the holiday season became the sites of numerous fatalities.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The large Mayfield Consumer Products candle factory in Mayfield, KY, was destroyed by a tornado. Eight people have been confirmed dead and another eight are missing.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Six people were killed when an Amazon distribution center in Illinois collapsed.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Here are <a href="https://www.wlky.com/article/want-to-help-western-kentucky-red-cross-sets-up-online-donations-for-victims-of-tornado-outbreak/38491592?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew#" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">ways to help</a> the tornado victims, and here is <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/weather/dramatic-drone-footage-captures-deadly-tornado-devastation-light-day-rcna8475?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">drone footage</a> showing the damage in Mayfield.</p>
</div>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/omicron-speed-round?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}">
<font color="#000000">
Omicron Speed Round
</font>
</a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Boosters work: </strong>New data from Israel showed that a <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/pfizer-booster-shots-are-effective-against-omicron-variant-israeli-study-says-11639317136?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">third shot</a> of Pfizer-BioNTech’s vaccine effectively prevents serious illness from the Omicron variant, but two doses doesn’t do the trick. A Pfizer study from last week revealed similar results.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">NY masks up:</strong> All public indoor places that do not require proof of vaccination will need to <a href="https://www.nbcnewyork.com/news/coronavirus/hochul-new-mask-mandate-for-all-indoor-venues-starts-monday/3443925/?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">mandate mask-wearing</a> starting today, per an order from Gov. Kathy Hochul. The move is intended to tamp down the state’s worst Covid surge in more than six months.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Return to office on hold: </strong>Companies including Meta, Ford, Alphabet, and Lyft have all recently <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/companies-upend-plans-on-covid-19-vaccines-and-office-returns-again-11639321203?mod=hp_lead_pos4" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pushed back</a> their return-to-office dates or expanded remote work options for employees. Jefferies, the investment bank, canceled its holiday party and in-person client meetings after a spike in cases at the firm.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The UK raises alert level: </strong>Prime Minister Boris Johnson said a “<a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-12-12/johnson-warns-of-u-k-covid-emergency-sets-new-booster-target?srnd=premium" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">tidal wave</a>” of Omicron cases would hit the country and that he’ll open up booster shots to all adults before the end of the year.</p>
</div>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GRAB BAG
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/key-performance-indicators-december-13?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}">
<font color="#000000">
Key Performance Indicators
</font>
</a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<a style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/key-performance-indicators-december-13?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew&mid={{md5(profile.email)}}&uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}" class="">
<img alt="Jars of Spam" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/3bb29b5f30a28bad0b958abc1f36d33199942a97-1024x572.jpg?w=670&q=70&auto=format">
</a><span class="source" style="display:inline-block;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px"><small><em>Hormel </em></small></span>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<div>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat:</strong> Canned meat is the food trend you've been sleeping on. Spam sales hit a <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/business-59603921?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">record high</a> for the seventh year in a row, the CEO of parent Hormel said. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>“I want to try something new, to go beyond politics to all the things I’m interested in; I’m ready for a new adventure.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>Fox News Sunday </em>host Chris Wallace announced he’s <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/12/12/fox-anchor-chris-wallace-is-leaving-network-after-18-years.html?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">leaving the network</a> after 18 years in a surprise announcement. Early next year he’ll begin hosting a weekly show for CNN+, CNN’s new streaming service.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>What if people don’t want a “career”? (<a href="https://warzel.substack.com/p/what-if-people-dont-want-a-career?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Galaxy Brain</a>)</p>
</div>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">All eyes on Powell: </strong>The final Fed meeting of the year should be <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/12/10/fed-is-expected-to-speed-up-end-of-bond-buying-and-signal-interest-rate-hikes-are-coming.html?utm_campaign=mb&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morning_brew" class="link" target="_blank" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">action-packed</a>, as Jerome Powell and his central bank pals try to tame the highest inflation rate in 39 years. <p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Earnings: </strong>The electric automaker Rivian will report earnings for the first time as a public company on Wednesday. FedEx also drops its quarterly numbers this week.</p>

</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Closing arguments for the Elizabeth Holmes trial begin on Thursday.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Tiger Woods will play alongside his son at the PNC Championship on Saturday, the first time he’s competed since a brutal car crash 10 months ago.</span></li>

<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>“I’ll be back.”</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>“That rug really tied the room together.”</span></li>

color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nCalifornia Takes Inspo From Texas \n\u003c/font\u003e\n\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ca style=\"text-decoration:none;border:none;\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/12/12/ca-governor-newsom-unveils-plan-for-assault-weapons-ban-with-texas-s-abortion-bill-as-inspiration?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\u0026mid={{md5(profile.email)}}\u0026uid={{profile.vars.access_token}}\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"SAN LEANDRO, CALIFORNIA - SEPTEMBER 08:  California Gov. Gavin Newsom sp...\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bl383u0v/production/70973ab384845823f080a7cda69b42d99616ee1c-5363x3488.jpg?w=670\u0026q=70\u0026auto=format\"\u003e\n\u003c/a\u003e\u003cspan class=\"source\" style=\"display:inline-block;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px\"\u003e\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eJustin Sullivan/Getty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWhen Texas passed an abortion law that leaves enforcement authority in the hands of private individuals, experts predicted this unusual structure could become a model for other legislation.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThey were right.\u003c/strong\u003e California Gov. Gavin Newsom said this weekend that he’s crafting a law that \u003ca href=\"https://www.axios.com/california-law-texas-abortion-ban-assault-weapons-af5d449d-4849-45b2-9493-92ac1c2e5f97.html?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebans assault-style weapons\u003c/a\u003e using an enforcement approach similar to that of Texas’s abortion bill. It would allow private citizens to sue anyone who manufactures, distributes, or sells those weapons for up to $10,000 (Texas’s law empowers individuals to sue abortion clinics.)\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSome context: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eCalifornia had previously banned assault weapons for 32 years, but that was \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/government-and-politics-california-courts-us-supreme-court-health-1c09f80feb967be7c52bec1e2f1b88a4?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eoverturned\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e this summer by a federal judge. Newsom ripped the judge following the ruling and began looking for alternative ways to enforce an assault weapons ban.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eEnter: Texas\u003c/h2\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eNewsom, a Democrat, is no fan of Texas’s law that bans most abortions—he’s even pledged to make California an abortion “sanctuary” should Roe v. Wade get upended by the Supreme Court.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSo far, Texas’s law is holding up in court despite a barrage of legal challenges, and last week the Supreme Court allowed it to remain in effect. Newsom thought, “Hey, if they can do it to advance their policy goals, so can I.”\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eGun rights advocates saw this coming. One nonprofit even filed a brief with the Supreme Court opposing Texas’s abortion law because of the potential consequences for the second amendment.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture: \u003c/strong\u003eRepublicans in California say Newsom’s announcement is just “grandstanding” in order to pad his presidential resume, should he decide to run. But it’s still a sign that other states aiming to ramp up gun control may take their cue from Texas.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear said more than 80 people were killed in his state, but expected the death toll to rise to over 100. It is the deadliest tornado event in the state’s history, Beshear said.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTwisters are rare for December, but atypical hot and humid weather contributed to a \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/deadly-tornadoes-that-ravaged-six-states-tied-to-weird-weather-patterns-11639339186?utm_campaign=mb\u0026utm_medium=newsletter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" class=\"link\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eremarkably powerful\u003c/a\u003e storm cluster.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eA single tornado traveled 250 miles, which, if initial reports are confirmed, would break the record for the longest tornado track.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eDebris were hurled up to 30,000 feet in the air, or as high as commercial jets fly.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFactories where workers were busy prepping products ahead of the holiday season became the sites of numerous fatalities.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe large Mayfield Consumer Products candle factory in Mayfield, KY, was destroyed by a tornado. Eight people have been confirmed dead and another eight are missing.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSix people were killed when an Amazon distribution center in Illinois collapsed.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHere are \u003ca
